arts.ttl: Premier League clubs "circling" - Lille 'expect offers' for England international
arts.sum: Lille are reportedly preparing for several offers from Premier League clubs for former Manchester United midfielder Angel Gomes during the January transfer window.

arts.ttl: Lille braced for Premier League bids for England international Angel Gomes
arts.sum: Angel Gomes’ (24) first England call-up thrust him into the limelight earlier this month. The former Manchester United midfielder has risen to prominence over the course of the past two…

arts.ttl: Lille predicted XI vs Le Havre: Angel Gomes to start; Tiago Santos to return
arts.sum: Lille will be hopeful of securing three points as they travel to Le Havre on Saturday evening in Ligue 1. Les Dogues were frustrated last weekend as they were held…

arts.ttl: Angel Gomes targeted by top Premier League clubs again after snubbing transfer offers
arts.sum: Manchester United academy graduate Angel Gomes has flourished since leaving the Premier League giants back in 2020 and is now on the radar of clubs back in England

arts.ttl: Angel Gomes 'set to attract offers from multiple Premier League clubs' after impressing on his England debut... as star's contract with Lille expires at the end of the season
arts.sum: The former Manchester United star impressed in his two Nations League appearances against Ireland and Finland, alerting many Champions League clubs to his availability.

arts.ttl: Edon Zhegrova’s reveals anger and dismisses ‘fake news’ after Kosovo exclusion
arts.sum: At the last international break, Edon Zhegrova (25) was sent home ahead of Kosovo’s trip to Cyprus where the Balkan nation won 4-0 sending them to second in their Nations…
